mapper.select: select goods_id goodsId, goods_name goodsName, isbn, goods_describe goodsDescribe, goods_price goodsPrice, goods_image_path goodsImagePath, goods_evaluate_score goodsEvaluateScore, goods_author goodsAuthor, goods_press goodsPress, version from t_info_goods where is_delete = 0 and goods_id = #{goodsId}

select b.user_acct userAcct, a.evaluate_content evaluateContent, a.evaluate_score evaluateScore, a.create_time createTime, c.image_path imagePath from t_info_goods_evaluate a, t_sys_user b, t_info_evaluate_image c where a.user_id = b.user_id and a.goods_id = #{goodsId} and a.is_delete = 0 and c.is_delete = 0 and a.evaluate_id = c.evaluate_id
and a.evaluate_score in(0,1)
and a.evaluate_score in(2,3)
and a.evaluate_score in(4,5)
order by a.create_time desc
select classify_id classifyId, classify_name classifyName from t_info_goods_classify where is_delete = 0 and classify_parent = '0' order by create_time desc
